items.content_html: The Notepad App is a simple and lightweight web application that allows you to create and manage notes effortlessly. Whether you need to jot down quick thoughts, make to-do lists, or save important information, this app provides a user-friendly interface for all your note-taking needs.
items.title: akaisky07/notepad-app: The Notepad App is a simple and lightweight web application that allows you to create and manage notes effortlessly. Whether you need to jot down quick thoughts, make to-do lists, or save important information, this app provides a user-friendly interface for all your note-taking needs.

items.content_html: 🏠 A lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CCU3, ELV-Charly or for running your "HomeMatic CCU" IoT central as a pure virtual appliance (using Proxmox VE, VirtualBox, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, Home Assistant, vmWare ESXi, etc.) or on your own RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, ODROID, etc. SBC device...
